__e: Once you have that, you can start to figure out the spirit's weaknesses.
I'm sorry you're too stupid to understand that it's a sign of weakness from the other side that they even offered this.
You've always had a weakness in holding on to money.
I understand a weakness for our kids, but I thought after that girl, after you dried up, I thought you were done with all this.
They see it as weakness, and I am not weak.
All human being has a moment of weakness and... calls it God, or whatever.
SHE TRIED TO CONVINCE ME THAT I HAD JUST HAD A WEAK MOMENT AND THAT IT WAS MY FAULT.
Every forcefield has a weakness and I'm confident that I shall find it.
But your father did reveal to me my only weakness in this world...
Every time he tries to use his left hand, he can't, and I know that left arm weakness can have something to do with your heart.
There must be something. A hole in his wall.
Your weakness is your strength, Father.
So am I. At least it's something I can understand.
And perhaps that weakness is the very reason you were chosen for this job.
Man, the booty is the man's biggest weakness.
But you'll never be a wonderful woman, or even a wonderful human being until you learn to have some regard for human frailty.
